opt_guide_complex_values_text.message: $O_BOLD$Complex values$C_BOLD$ are either arrays containing strings or maps of key/value pairs.

opt_guide_introduction_case_sensitivity_.message: The names of simple tags and sections are case-insensitive, therefore $O_CODE${name}$C_CODE$ will output the same as $O_CODE${NaMe}$C_CODE$. However, sections must be opened and closed with names in the same case (i.e. $O_CODE${#name}...{/NaMe}$C_CODE$ will not work).

opt_guide_introduction_inverted_section_.message: $O_BOLD$Accessing$C_BOLD$ - Only renders the contents if the value is an empty object
$O_BOLD$Conditions$C_BOLD$ - Only renders the contents if the value is $O_EMPH$falsey$C_EMPH$
$O_BOLD$Iterating$C_BOLD$ - Only renders the contents if the value is an empty list
Inverted sections are very similar to normal sections but are written like this $O_CODE${^name}...{/name}$C_CODE$ and can be used in for the following purposes;

opt_guide_introduction_notes_text_1.message: If you are having problems with understanding this guide please $O_LINK_1$https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/dcjnfaoifoefmnbhhlbppaebgnccfddf$O_LINK_2$leave a comment here$C_LINK$ and we will try to help you and take your comments on board, updating the documentation if required.

opt_guide_introduction_notes_text_2.message: If you encounter any problems while using $O_BOLD$Template$C_BOLD$ and/or would like to see a change or addition, please $O_LINK_1$https://github.com/neocotic/template/issues$O_LINK_2$raise an issue$C_LINK$ and we will have a look at it.

opt_guide_introduction_notes_text_3.message: For more examples, try looking at the predefined templates.

opt_guide_introduction_section_accessing.message: $O_BOLD$Accessing$C_BOLD$ - If the value is an object it will render the contents while making the properties of that object available as variables

opt_guide_introduction_section_condition.message: $O_BOLD$Conditions$C_BOLD$ - Only renders the contents if the value is $O_EMPH$truey$C_EMPH$

opt_guide_introduction_section_iterating.message: $O_BOLD$Iterating$C_BOLD$ - If the value is an array it will render the contents for each enumerable item of that value

opt_guide_introduction_section_operation.message: $O_BOLD$Operations$C_BOLD$ - Renders the outcome of the operation, passing the contents as the argument

opt_guide_introduction_section_text.message: Sections are always surrounded by opening and closing tags like this $O_CODE${#name}...{/name}$C_CODE$ and can be used for the following purposes;

opt_guide_introduction_simple_tag_text_1.message: Tags are always surrounded by curly braces like this $O_CODE${name}$C_CODE$ and output the value of the named variable. If that value is undefined or $O_EMPH$falsey$C_EMPH$ it will simply be deleted.

opt_guide_introduction_simple_tag_text_2.message: Values are not escaped by default and, in order to do so, you must use double braces like this $O_CODE${{name}}$C_CODE$. This will escape certain characters ($O_CODE$&$C_CODE$ $O_CODE$<$C_CODE$ $O_CODE$>$C_CODE$ $O_CODE$"$C_CODE$ $O_CODE$'$C_CODE$) so that the final output can be safely copied in to $O_ABBR_1$Extensible Markup Language$O_ABBR_2$XML$C_ABBR$ and $O_ABBR_1$Hyper Text Markup Language$O_ABBR_2$HTML$C_ABBR$.

opt_guide_introduction_text.message: $O_BOLD$Template$C_BOLD$ uses an advanced, yet simple, template system to allows you to create and modify the content to be copied to the clipboard. The syntax is really straight-forward and consists of the following categories;

opt_guide_options_anchor_target_text.message: Whether or not the option to include the anchor tags $O_EMPH$target$C_EMPH$ attribute is enabled

opt_guide_options_anchor_title_text.message: Whether or not the option to include the anchor tags $O_EMPH$target$C_EMPH$ attribute is enabled

opt_guide_options_bitly_api_key_text.message: The $O_ABBR_1$Application Programming Interface$O_ABBR_2$API$C_ABBR$ key associated with your $O_LINK_1$http://bit.ly/a/account$O_LINK_2$bit.ly account$C_LINK$

opt_guide_options_bitly_text.message: Whether or not $O_LINK_1$http://bit.ly$O_LINK_2$bit.ly$C_LINK$ is the enabled $O_ABBR_1$Uniform Resource Locator$O_ABBR_2$URL$C_ABBR$ shortener

opt_guide_options_bitly_username_text.message: The username associated with your $O_LINK_1$http://bit.ly/a/account$O_LINK_2$bit.ly account$C_LINK$

opt_guide_options_context_menu_text.message: Whether or not the option to show the context (right-click) menu is enabled

opt_guide_options_googl_text.message: Whether or not $O_LINK_1$http://goo.gl$O_LINK_2$goo.gl$C_LINK$ is the enabled $O_ABBR_1$Uniform Resource Locator$O_ABBR_2$URL$C_ABBR$ shortener

opt_guide_options_text.message: $O_BOLD$Options$C_BOLD$ are values stored by the extension to reflect user preferences. These can either be accessed as simple tags or conditional sections.

opt_guide_protected_tag_text.message: $O_BOLD$*$C_BOLD$ Not available on internal Chrome pages or the $O_LINK_1$https://chrome.google.com/webstore/$O_LINK_2$Chrome Web Store$C_LINK$

opt_guide_simple_values_browser_version_.message: The current version of the browser (e.g. $O_EMPH$$EXAMPLE$$C_EMPH$)

opt_guide_simple_values_character_set_te.message: The $O_LINK_1$http://www.iana.org/assignments/character-sets$O_LINK_2$character set$C_LINK$ used by the page (e.g. $O_EMPH$$EXAMPLE$$C_EMPH$)

opt_guide_simple_values_cookies_enabled_.message: Whether or not cookies are enabled

opt_guide_simple_values_custom_count_tex.message: The total number of user-defined templates

opt_guide_simple_values_directory_text.message: The directory part of the path (e.g. $O_EMPH$$EXAMPLE$$C_EMPH$)

opt_guide_simple_values_favicon_text.message: The whole $O_ABBR_1$Uniform Resource Locator$O_ABBR_2$URL$C_ABBR$ of the page's favicon

opt_guide_simple_values_fragment_anchor_.message: The entire string after the hash (#) symbol

opt_guide_simple_values_last_modified_te.message: The last modified data/time of the page in $O_LINK_1$http://www.faqs.org/rfcs/rfc2822.html$O_LINK_2$RFC 2822$C_LINK$ format

opt_guide_simple_values_original_title_t.message: The original title of the page (may be different than $O_LABEL$title$C_LABEL$ if a supported extension was detected and the value of $O_LABEL$title$C_LABEL$ was extracted from this)

opt_guide_simple_values_original_url_tex.message: The original whole $O_ABBR_1$Uniform Resource Locator$O_ABBR_2$URL$C_ABBR$ being parsed (may be different than $O_LABEL$url$C_LABEL$ if a supported extension was detected and the value of $O_LABEL$url$C_LABEL$ was extracted from this)

opt_guide_simple_values_query_text.message: The entire query string if it exists (e.g. $O_EMPH$$EXAMPLE$$C_EMPH$)

opt_guide_simple_values_referrer_text.message: The $O_ABBR_1$Uniform Resource Locator$O_ABBR_2$URL$C_ABBR$ of the referring page

opt_guide_simple_values_relative_text.message: The relative path to the file including the query string (e.g. $O_EMPH$$EXAMPLE$$C_EMPH$)

opt_guide_simple_values_short_text.message: The whole $O_ABBR_1$Uniform Resource Locator$O_ABBR_2$URL$C_ABBR$ being parsed (shortened via the active $O_ABBR_1$Uniform Resource Locator$O_ABBR_2$URL$C_ABBR$ shortener)

opt_guide_simple_values_text.message: $O_BOLD$Standard$c_BOLD$ variables are generally accessed using simple tags or sections (including inverted).

opt_guide_simple_values_title_text.message: The title of the page or $O_LABEL$url$C_LABEL$ if the title could not be detected (e.g. page had not finished loading)

opt_guide_simple_values_url_text.message: The whole $O_ABBR_1$Uniform Resource Locator$O_ABBR_2$URL$C_ABBR$ being parsed

opt_url_shortener_oauth_enabled_googl_he.message: $O_BOLD$OAuth$C_BOLD$ is an open protocol that aims to standardize the way desktop and web applications access a user's private data. OAuth provides a mechanism for users to grant access to private data without sharing their private credentials (username/password).
